name: Tomb of Emphidia
text: ATTACH: This planet is considered a legendary planet and it's influence value is increased by 1. At the end of your turn, exhaust this card to draw 2 cards from an exploration deck of your choice. If at least one of them is a fragment, you may take it and discard the other. If the player who has the "Crown of Emphidia" relic has control of this planet, they can use that relic to gain 1 VP.
